text: aur hamane moosa ko tees raaton ka vachan[1] diya aur usakee poortee das raaton se kar dee, to tere paalanahaar kee nirdhaarit avadhi chaalees raat pooree ho gayee tatha moosa ne apane bhaee haaroon se kahaah tum meree jaati mein mera pratinidhi rahana, sudhaar karate rahana aur upadravakaariyon kee neeti na apanaana
